# OoO *(o-o-o-o-o)*

Lets go post-application!

## Brief API
```
var Oo = require ('o-o-o-o-o') .Oo
var o = require ('o-o-o-o-o') .o
var oO = require ('o-o-o-o-o') .oO

Oo (image,
  o (scale_up),
  o (invert),
  o (edge_recognition),
  oO (output_to_file))
```
`Oo` for declaring application context, `o` for next application, `oO` for ending the chain.
